name: rmaker_common
author: espressif
description: ESP RainMaker firmware agent Common component
readme:
ESP RainMaker Common modules

This component consists of some common modules used by ESP RainMaker and ESP RainMaker Diagnostics repos. Currently, it consists of

  • MQTT glue layer
  • Timing APIs (SNTP helpers, timezone, etc.)
  • Factory NVS helpers
  • Work Queue
